## ğŸ“¦ Installation

```bash
pip install performance-profiler-optimizer
```

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```python
from performance_profiler import HistoricalTracker

tracker = HistoricalTracker(db_path="performance.db")

@tracker.track
def my_function():
    return sum(range(100000))

# Run multiple times to build history
for _ in range(10):
    my_function()

# View trends
tracker.print_history("my_function")
trend = tracker.get_trend("my_function", "execution_time")
print(f"Trend: {trend['trend']}")
```
